critique: The executive order primarily focuses on financial compensation for members of the advisory board of engineers for the Panama Canal. It outlines specific amounts for their services, daily expenses, and travel costs. The order also addresses the compensation of Gen. Davis and Gen. Abbott, ensuring they receive the same amount as other members despite their retired pay status.The emotions the president wants to evoke are joy and surprise. Joy because the members are getting paid and surprise because the president is making sure everyone is getting paid the same amount. Revised scores are joy: 3, surprise: 2, disgust: 1, fear: 1, sadness: 1.
